heading: HB00552
0: AN ACT REQUIRING THE MANDATORY PRE-AUDIT OF GOVERNMENT DISBURSEMENTS AND USES OF FUNDS
status: Pending with the Committee on APPROPRIATIONS since 2016-07-27
history:
House Bill/Resolution NO. HB00552
FULL TITLE : AN ACT REQUIRING THE MANDATORY PRE-AUDIT OF GOVERNMENT DISBURSEMENTS AND USES OF FUNDS
ABSTRACT : Provides that the absence of pre-audit involving infrastructure projects, procurement of goods and consulting services makes the government contract null and void.
PRINCIPAL AUTHOR/S : DEL MAR, RAUL V.
DATE FILED : 2016-06-30
SIGNIFICANCE: NATIONAL
NATURE : Economic
CO-AUTHORS (Journal Entries) :
1. Tambunting (014 2016-08-23)
ACTIONS TAKEN BY THE COMMITTEE ON RULES
REFERRAL TO THE COMMITTEE ON APPROPRIATIONS ON 2016-07-27
